meanings.definition: Of or relating to two different genera.
meanings.sent1: The bigeneric plant displayed characteristics from both genera.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the bigeneric species to understand its unique traits.
meanings.sent3: The bigeneric flower confused the botanist with its mixed features.
meanings.sent4: Her bigeneric artwork combined elements from two distinct styles.
meanings.sent5: The bigeneric hybrid tree stood out in the forest with its unusual blend of traits.

meanings.definition: A taxonomic group containing two different genera.
meanings.sent1: The bigeneric in the zoo fascinated visitors with its diverse origins.
meanings.sent2: The biologist classified the bigeneric as a unique group in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The bigeneric in the exhibit made the children giggle at its unusual mix.
meanings.sent4: The bigeneric of animals in the sanctuary symbolized harmony between different species.
meanings.sent5: The zookeeper proudly presented the bigeneric to showcase biodiversity in nature.
